description: Defines a Flutter widget called MatchCard, a stateless widget that displays profile information including an image, name, age, and a favorite icon.

classes.name: MatchCard
classes.description: A compact, tappable card widget displaying profile image, name, age, and a favorite icon.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the MatchCard, assembling InkWell, Card, Column, Image, Text, and Icon widgets.
